Imaster's Patient Record Management System contains a stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the endpoint ‘/projects/hospital/admin/edit_patient.php’. By injecting a malicious script into the ‘firstname’ parameter, the JavaScript code is stored and executed every time a user accesses the patient list, allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript in a victim's browser. 12/01/2026 12/01/2026 Vector CVSS:4.0 CVSS:4.0/AV:N/AC:L/AT:N/PR:L/UI:P/VC:N/VI:N/VA:N/SC:L/SI:L/SA:N/E:X/CR:X/IR:X/AR:X/MAV:X/MAC:X/MAT:X/MPR:X/MUI:X/MVC:X/MVI:X/MVA:X/MSC:X/MSI:X/MSA:X/S:X/AU:X/R:X/V:X/RE:X/U:X Gravedad 4.0 5.10 Gravedad 4.0 txt MEDIUM Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) Pendiente de análisis

MLFlow versions up to and including 3.4.0 are vulnerable to DNS rebinding attacks due to a lack of Origin header validation in the MLFlow REST server. This vulnerability allows malicious websites to bypass Same-Origin Policy protections and execute unauthorized calls against REST endpoints. An attacker can query, update, and delete experiments via the affected endpoints, leading to potential data exfiltration, destruction, or manipulation. The issue is resolved in version 3.5.0. 12/01/2026 12/01/2026 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:N Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 8.10 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) HIGH

The Quiz Maker WordPress plugin before 6.7.0.89 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup). 12/01/2026 12/01/2026 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) Pendiente de análisis
